issues.message: Step 'test.Run linting' lacks error handling for commands that might fail
Step 'build.Build application' lacks error handling for commands that might fail
Step 'daily-automation.Run daily automation' lacks error handling for commands that might fail
Step 'daily-automation.Generate performance report' lacks error handling for commands that might fail
Step 'daily-automation.Send Teams notification' lacks error handling for commands that might fail
Potential hardcoded secret reference: TEAMS_WEBHOOK_URL

Step 'manual-execution.Set up environment variables' has unquoted variables: $FB_AD_ACCOUNT_I, $GITHUB_ENV, $FB_ACCESS_TOKE, $GITHUB_ENV, $FB_PAGE_I, $GITHUB_ENV, $ANTHROPIC_API_KE, $GITHUB_ENV, $GITHUB_TOKE, $GITHUB_ENV
Step 'manual-execution.Test posting capability' lacks error handling for commands that might fail
Step 'manual-execution.Post daily content' lacks error handling for commands that might fail
Step 'manual-execution.Dry run simulation' lacks error handling for commands that might fail
Step 'manual-execution.Notify completion' has unquoted variables: $TEAMS_WEBHOOK_UR, $CONTENT_TYPE, $STATUS, $CONTENT_TYPE, $DRY_RUN, $TEAMS_WEBHOOK_UR
Potential hardcoded secret reference: FB_AD_ACCOUNT_ID
Potential hardcoded secret reference: FB_ACCESS_TOKEN
Potential hardcoded secret reference: FB_PAGE_ID
Potential hardcoded secret reference: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
Potential hardcoded secret reference: GITHUB_TOKEN
Potential hardcoded secret reference: TEAMS_WEBHOOK_URL
Step 'setup-secrets.Get secrets from Azure Key Vault and set in GitHub' has unquoted variables: $REP, $AZURE_CRED, $REP
Step 'setup-secrets.Verify secrets are set' has unquoted variables: $REP
Potential hardcoded secret reference: GITHUB_TOKEN
